pr_title: DG-377 Allow generated classes to use refs during serialization

timeline.message: DG-377 Compare schemas using deepEquals during register

timeline.bodyText: Is this optimization still happening ? As it is, we are parsing the previous schemas.
timeline.author: dragosvictor

replies.bodyText: Yes, this optimization is moved to another method.
replies.author: rayokota

replies.bodyText: Ok, I see what you mean.  Yes, it is no longer happening.  I'll remove.
replies.author: rayokota

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to collect this ?
timeline.author: dragosvictor
